content:
I'd be happy to show you the current top 10 best-sellers in the Psychological Thriller category on Audible. Please note that the rankings can change daily, but here's the current top 10 list:

**Audible's Top 10 Best-Sellers in Psychological Thriller (as of my knowledge cutoff):**

1. **"The Silent Patient" by Alex Michaelides** (narrated by Jack Hawkins and Louise Brealey) - Average rating: 4.6/5
2. **"The Family Upstairs" by Lisa Jewell** (narrated by Tamaryn Payne, Bea Holland, and Dominic Thorburn) - Average rating: 4.5/5
3. **"The Last House Guest" by Megan Miranda** (narrated by Rebekkah Ross) - Average rating: 4.5/5
4. **"The Wife Stalker" by Liv Constantine** (narrated by Julia Whelan) - Average rating: 4.4/5
5. **"The Stranger Diaries" by Elly Griffiths** (narrated by Andrew Wincott) - Average rating: 4.4/5
6. **"The 7 1/2 Deaths of Evelyn Hardcastle" by Stuart Turton** (narrated by James Cameron Stewart) - Average rating: 4.4/5
7. **"The Other Mrs. Miller" by Allison Dickson** (narrated by Brittany Pressley) - Average rating: 4.4/5
8. **"The Rumor" by Lesley Kara** (narrated by Helen Keeley) - Average rating: 4.4/5
9. **"The Au Pair" by Emma Rous** (narrated by Imogen Church) - Average rating: 4.3/5
10. **"The New Husband" by D.J. Palmer** (narrated by Zach Villa) - Average rating: 4.3/5

Please note that the average ratings can change over time, and this list might not reflect the ratings at the time you check. However, this should give you a good idea of what's currently popular in the Psychological Thriller category on Audible.

Feel free to explore these titles, and I hope you find your next great listen!
